scripts.compile: babel src/main/node --out-dir .compiled; browserify .compiled/TestComponent.js > src/main/resources/com/nunopinheiro/vaadin_react/generated/TestComponent.js; cp node_modules/react-dom/dist/react-dom.min.js src/main/resources/com/nunopinheiro/vaadin_react/generated/; cp node_modules/react/dist/react.min.js src/main/resources/com/nunopinheiro/vaadin_react/generated/
